医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
研究表明，生命第一年的日光暴露可能会减少MS复发根据2025年2月12日在网上发表的一项Neurology®神经免疫学上在线发表的一项研究，在生命的第一年，至少要在生命的第一年获得至少30分钟的夏季阳光，这可能意味着被诊断出多发性硬化症（MS）的儿童的复发风险较低。 ＆Neuroinflammation，美国神经病学会的官方杂志。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/study-suggests-sun-posun-defing-fir--fir--fir--firfife-may-may-reduce-ms-relapses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/study-suggests-sun-posun-defing-during-fir--fir--fir--firfi fire-may-may-reduce-ms-relapses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e6fa5df4-683f-4C8E-AD11-167B9BA1451D Thu, 13 Feb 2025 02:21:24 -0500 Study suggests sun exposure during first year of life may reduce MS relapses
硬膜外类固醇注射可能会为一些背痛提供适度的短期疼痛缓解美国神经病学会（AAN）开发了一项新的系统评价，以总结神经病学家和其他临床医生的硬膜外类固醇注射的证据，以及它们是否减轻了某些慢性背痛的人的疼痛和残疾。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/epidural-steroid-injections-may-offer-modest-modest-short-term-term-pain-relief------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/epidural-steroid-injections-may-offer-modest-modest-short-term-term-term-pain-relief---------------pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b0536c6-7b7a-464b-80f3-561683e4219a Thu, 13 Feb 2025 02:17:46 -0500 Epidural steroid injections may offer modest short-term pain relief for some back pain
研究发现，脑老化与神经元过度激活相关，而不是下降。日本纳戈亚大学（Nagoya University）研究人员对线虫的一项研究发现，与衰老相关的脑功能下降是由于某些神经元的过度激活，而不是神经元活性的下降引起的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/brain-aging-link-to-neuronal-hyperactivation-not-decline-not-decline-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/brain-agging-to-to-neuronal-hyperactivation-not-decline-not-decline-cudly-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2bf8df9f-0a20-4e17-91E6-38516063923E Thu, 13 Feb 2025 02:12:32 -0500 Brain aging linked to neuronal hyperactivation, not decline, study finds
takumi形的DNA水凝胶显示出靶向疗法的希望水凝胶是具有三维网络结构的聚合物材料，其中包含大量水。它们可以作为持续释放药物输送系统，因为它们可以封装各种生物活性物质，包括药物，抗原甚至细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/takumi-shape-dna-hydrogels-show-promise-promise-formise-forgor-targeted-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/takumi-shape-dna-hydrogels-show-promise-promise-formise-forgor-targeted-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=Ad2310b3-b979-4eb6-b101-b101-f5b13c7a9999b3 Thu, 13 Feb 2025 01:45:35 -0500 Takumi-shaped DNA hydrogels show promise for targeted therapies
KLX通过防止EndMT减轻动脉粥样硬化进展动脉粥样硬化是一种以脂质和动脉壁中炎性细胞积累为特征的疾病，是心血管事件的重要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/klx-mitigates-athersclorotic-progression-progression-by-preventing-endmt.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/klx-mitigates-athersost-progress-progression-by by-preventing-endmt.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=90f8d16a-8df6-492a-9541-8bf7ac8fe03e Thu, 13 Feb 2025 01:41:50 -0500 KLX mitigates atherosclerotic progression by preventing EndMT
剑桥研究显示，仅疫苗接种可能无法保护免疫功能低下的患者。剑桥大学的新研究表明，即使疫苗已经产生了抗体的产生，也可能不足以保护免疫系统受损的人免受感染的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/vaccinations-alone-may-not-not-protect-mmnocompromprompompompompompatients-patients-cambridge-cambridge-research-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/vaccinations-alone-may-not-not-protect-mmmonocompromprompompatients-patients-patients-cambridge-cambridge-research-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=178715cf-4531-4035-9EFD-B0B7B7119E70 Thu, 13 Feb 2025 01:36:53 -0500 Vaccinations alone may not protect immunocompromised patients, Cambridge research shows
混合闭环胰岛素泵可以改善范围的时间，但增加了酮症酸中毒患有1型糖尿病的人需要连续胰岛素治疗，并且必须定期测量其葡萄糖水平。使用开环疗法*，可以手动控制胰岛素给药，而混合闭环系统*自动调节胰岛素的递送。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/hybrid-closed-closed-close-loop-insulin-pumps-improve time-in-range-nange-nange-but-increase-incrase-incrase-akidosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/hybrid-closed-close-loop-insulin-pumps-improve time-in-range-nange-range-but-increase-incrase-ackidosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=BCC3CE61-88C8-499A-B93A-EEEC41ADADC6 Thu, 13 Feb 2025 01:30:00 -0500 Hybrid closed-loop insulin pumps improve time in range, but increase ketoacidosis
Olpasiran明显降低了与心血管风险有关的“不良胆固醇”根据Sinai Mount研究人员的分析，RNA抑制剂OLPASIRAN显着降低了与心血管事件的高风险相关的“不良胆固醇”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/Olpasiran-significantly-lowers-bad-cholesterol-linked-to-cardiovascular-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/olpasiran-simnificational-lowers-lowers-bad-cholesterol-ninked to-to-cardiescular-cardiescular-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3064874-a7dd-4f4a-9c7e-6fffd89222225 Thu, 13 Feb 2025 01:23:31 -0500 Olpasiran significantly lowers "bad cholesterol" linked to cardiovascular risk
研究表明，系统性种族主义可能在基因检测差异中发挥作用。对于具有自闭症，癫痫和全球发育迟缓等神经系统疾病迹象的儿童，基因检测可以帮助做出诊断，确定可能的治疗方法并确定是否可能受到家庭成员的影响以及其他益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/systemitic-racism-may-play-a-play-a-play-a-role-in-genetic-genetic-testing-disparities-nesparities-study-suggests.aspxs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/systemitic-racism-may-play-a-play-a-play-a-role-in-genetic-ingenetic-testing-desparities-nesparities-sparuity-study-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6089309d-2c78-4313-b76b-fb5b5b6e95237e Thu, 13 Feb 2025 01:08:12 -0500 Systemic racism may play a role in genetic testing disparities, study suggests
亨斯曼癌症研究所改善了农村癌症患者的访问犹他大学的亨斯曼癌症研究所获得了联邦合同奖，该奖项将扩大犹他州农村和边境患者的专业癌症护理的机会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/huntsman-cancer-institute-improves-improves-access-access-for----------- access-for-rural-cancercer-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/huntsman-cancer-institute-improves-improves-access-access-for-rural-cancer-cancer-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2E796DAA-5DE0-41AC-AC-AD6F-94B2606C91DF Thu, 13 Feb 2025 01:02:24 -0500 Huntsman Cancer Institute improves access for rural cancer patients
